text: Hi! <https://www.bridgerev.com/|Bridges> is a Platinum Tier HubSpot Partner and we are adding to our team in Oklahoma City, OK, USA.  We are hiring a *Junior Web Disigner,* full-time, in-office, and with great benefits, to join our Digital Production Team.  Accepting Applications via our website: <https://www.bridgerev.com/junior-web-designer>
